name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Senior IoT Engineer with 8+ years in software engineering, I bring extensive expertise in **AWS IoT**, **Azure IoT**, and **GCP IoT Core**, implementing secure and efficient solutions tailored for the IoT sector. Proficient in **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, I excel in building scalable applications designed for embedded systems and firmware development. My technical skills also include familiarity with **MQTT**, **Modbus**, and stream-based architecture, along with solid experience in **Kafka** and **Pulsar** for real-time data streaming. My foundational knowledge in programming languages like **Java**, **Rust**, and **C/C++** empowers me to contribute to diverse IoT projects while ensuring optimal performance and reliability through best practices in **data encryption**, **authentication**, and **IoT security**. I am also adept at utilizing **CI/CD** pipelines, **event sourcing**, and **CQRS**, allowing me to deliver robust and future-ready IoT solutions.
